title: Nuclear 2025 conference: Energy Secretary speech
description: Energy Secretary Ed Miliband spoke at the Nuclear Industry Association's Nuclear 2025 conference.
content:
Thank you, Tom [Greatrex] for that kind introduction. 
If you think about where we are now compared to where we were 9 years ago, its extraordinary the journey that the industry has been on and Tom … [+15426 chars]
